text: Joseph-Marie Tissier was bishop of Châlons in France from 1912–1948. He dedicated the ossuary and memorial in Souain-Perthes-lès-Hurlus that holds the remains of 130 members of the French Foreign Legion who died in the Second Battle of Champagne. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:French bishops Category:Bishops of Châlons-sur-Marne Category:20th- century Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Tissier
